title: Cannabis and the Bible - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/7/21
itunes:title: Cannabis and the Bible - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/7/21
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and author Edward Dodge explore his research into references to cannabis in the Bible, and how it and other psychedelic drugs could have been used for potions and ceremonies during the early days of the Christian church.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
